attributes.action: FAMILIES NEED TO VISIT MEMORIAL IN IRAQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The families of soldiers who have been killed in Iraq demand a visit to Basra to view the Memorial laid by soldiers.
It is very important for us to view this meorial before it is demolished.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
